ToggleDataGridView.Title: Display 2D Structure View
ToggleDataGridView.ShortHelp: Show or Hide's the 2D Structure View
ToggleDataGridView.LongHelp: Activate command to navigate in 2D structure, Cross-Highlight, Hide/Show and reframe on 3D graphics.
DELWeb3DGenerateIssueCmd.Title: Generate Issue
DELWeb3DGenerateIssueCmd.LongHelp: Select a single or multiple object to create an issue.
DELOERRelationalNavigatorCmd.Title: Relations
DELOERRelationalNavigatorCmd.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations widget and displays the ecosystem of related objects.
DELWeb3DFilterCmd.Title: Filter
DELWeb3DFilterCmd.ShortHelp: Filters the structure either by attribute, selection, configuration or by volume.
DELWeb3DFilterCmd.LongHelp: Opens the filter panel where you can define the criteria to filter the structure either by attribute, selection, configuration or by volume.
CleanAll.Title: Close
CleanAll.ShortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.
